nodes.text: Lagon was a Trandoshan hunter and part of a group of Trandoshans that hunted down innocent beings for sport on Wasskah, a moon of Trandosha. After the death of leader Garnac's son, Dar, Lagon attempted to hunt down his killer, Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, but lost her scent and had to give up. Lagon was subsequently defeated in a skirmish with several Wookiees, one of whom hurled Lagon off the Trandoshan's floating fortress.
Lagos was voiced by James Arnold Taylor in Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
